text: Robert Ward (born 1881) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1881 births Category:People from Glasgow Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Abercorn F.C. players Category:Port Glasgow Athletic F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Bradford (Park Avenue) A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Year of death missing
title: Bob Ward (footballer)
